name: My One Hotel Villa Ducale

reviews.text: I travel to Parma a lot and use this hotel because its far enough away from the centre, located on a main road, breakfast isquite good for an italian breakfast, it has free wireless internet, which is rare in Italy and if you are visiting in summer the hotel is 300 mts away from a big outdoor leisure complex / pool
reviews.title: Comfortable rooms free internet access

reviews.text: My business contact on Parma book this hotel for me at an excellent rate.
reviews.title: Uninviting Environment But OK Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Pretty strange!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - room was ample, modern light, airy, clean and well equipped
reviews.title: A bit out of town, but worth a stay
Nice Hotel...
reviews.text: - bathroom, reasonably ample, shower ok good pressure, the "rocket" is nothing extravagant nor new, fairly common in Italy, it does offer the possibility of "water massage" not bad ..., good free toiletries

description: The MOH Villa Ducale hotel in Parma is the spectacular result of a harmonious coalescence of contrasting architectural styles.First constructed as the official residence for one of Parma's noble families, it has since been transformed into a luxurious hotel, which in two "dedicated" wings, offers either the characteristic charm of the historic building or the serene environment created by innovative modern design.Just one km from the 'Parma Centro' motorway exit and just a few minutes from the historic city centre, the hotel boasts an ideal strategic location which yet again reflects its distinctive duality of history and modernity.Tourists can spend a captivating holiday discovering the many artistic, gastronomic and musical treasures that Parma has to offer; a city that still pays homage in many artistic forms to the Maestro of Italian opera, Giuseppe Verdi.
